actions.name: Sky Bouquet
actions.description: Passive: The user changes from its Sky Forme to its Land Forme if Rainy, Snowy, Gloomy, Shady, or Glowy Weathers (or their Intense variants) are present. The user may freely change Formes as a Downtime Action. Depending on its Forme, it gains two Abilities: Land Forme - Natural Cure, Harvest; Sky Forme - Serene Grace, Wind Rider

system.description: Effect: The user changes Forme. Passive: The user changes from its Sky Forme to its Land Forme if Rainy, Snowy, Gloomy, Shady, or Glowy Weathers (or their Intense variants) are present. The user may freely change Formes as a Downtime Action. Depending on its Forme, it gains two Abilities: Land Forme - Natural Cure, Harvest; Sky Forme - Serene Grace, Wind Rider
